issue.title: [Documentation] Add contributor guide to Sphinx documentation
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2793](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2793). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should document the desired contributor workflow (e.g. git branches, etc.) someplace. We should put this in the Sphinx project

comments.body:

<http://arrow.apache.org/docs/developers/contributing.html> exists; is there something that needs to be added?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2793?focusedCommentId=16932355) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
